Then \w he|strong="H1004"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* him, “\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.”
